buff.description_key: You are gaining the rest of the King of the Apocalypse
Meep meep!

buff.tooltip_key: Ahh! Nothing better than a smoke
buff.description_key: You are enjoying a smoke.(Wellness loss 0.1 every game hour)
You are the one who KNOCKS
You are as swift as a Murloc! BLRGHGHGHMLMHGH
She's got you, kill her!
Man you are HUNGRY! Hey what are you doing and where are you going!
buff.tooltip_key: You have no idea what you are doing!

buff.description_key: Digging through those bodies has made you bloody. Use a wet towel soon or the blood will seep into any wounds.

buff.tooltip_key: You Need to Wash Up Or Else
buff.description_key: Its gotten pretty bad. Use a washcloth and soap very soon or you will become infected
You have eaten a rotten apple and have become sick
The radiation is too much and is going to kill you. Take an Anti Rad Pill to cure it.
This Anti Rad Pill will allow you to walk on Radiated Soil for up to 3 minutes before you will need to take another one
buff.tooltip_key: You Are Immune to Radiation for 3 Minutes

buff.description_key: The Iodine Pill was initially developed by the Military to enter Radiated Zones but its effects do not last very long.
buff.tooltip_key: You Are Immune to Radiation for 1 Minute

buff.description_key: A Car Alarm has sounded. Leave the area quick before zombies spot you
buff.tooltip_key: You Have Set Off a Car Alarm

buff.description_key: Your snake bite will slow you down. Use Anti Venom crafted from a Venom Gland to cure it
buff.tooltip_key: You Have Been Bitten By A Snake!

buff.description_key: You are recovering from an infection, sleeping in a bed increases recovery rate.
You are recovering from an infection, sleeping in a bed increases recovery rate.
You are recovering from an infection, sleeping in a bed increases recovery rate.
While sleeping on a sleeping bag you will cut Infection rate in half.
While sleeping on a small bed you will stop infection rate completely.
While sleeping on a big bed you will counter the infection by half its rate.
Close inspection reveals a minor infection.
You are clean.
You are dirty and starting to smell, the dirtier you are the more prone you are to infection!
You’re really starting to smell. Might want to take a bath soon.
You are filthy and are highly prone to infection.
buff.tooltip_key: You’re filthy and you really stink

buff.description_key: Any wounds you have are extremely likely to give you an infection. You need to get clean!
buff.tooltip_key: Extremely dirty and prone to infection!

buff.description_key: Rinsing off will not get you completly clean.
Rinsing off will not get you completly clean.
You are bathing and will become clean over time.
Increases wellness slowly over time.
You are well rested.
You are tired and should get some rest
You are feeling pretty tired and should go to sleep.
You are very tired and need to sleep!
You are extremely tired and need to sleep!
You are insanely tired and running on fumes!
You are dead tired, and if you dont sleep soon you will die!
You are resting and will recover from fatigue slowly.
You are resting and will recover from fatigue slowly.
You are resting and will recover from fatigue slowly.
You are resting and will recover from fatigue, feels better than a sleeping bag!
You are resting and will recover from fatigue, now this is comfy!
You are too tired to swim right now!
You cannot Breathe.
You are now drowning.
You are feeling slightly weak from blood loss but nothing serious
You are feeling weak from blood loss and losing wellness
You are feeling extrememly weak from major blood loss and are losing wellness
You have applied sunblocker which will cool you down a bit in hot temperatures.
You are taking a small break. Your health and stamina will recover while doing this.
